bl.tools
Class Converter

java.lang.Object
  bl.tools.Converter

public class Converter
extends java.lang.Object

Tool to read in the serialized graph objects, and convert them to a different hierarchy level and print them into a LG graph DB. Internally calls GraphConverter

Author:
Christopher Oßner

Nested Class Summary

           The level we want.

Constructor Detail

Converter

public Converter(java.lang.String inputDir,
                 java.lang.String outputFile,
                 boolean writeWeights,
                 boolean includeDummies,
                 boolean skipConstructors,
                 boolean includeJre)

Parameters:
inputDir - DB of serialized graphs
outputFile - the LG
writeWeights - include weights to the LG (no 'real' LG anymore)
includeDummies - write dummy vertices to LG?
skipConstructors - do not write constructor signatures to LG
